comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Bailey mocks, but a lot of NASCAR drivers have actually gotten lost during a race. Mostly Okies, I'm sorry to say. The organization is cognizant of the problem and they're working on ways to fly the cars by wire, which would allow the drivers more time to work on media skills. And, speaking of media skills, how's this: "I'm afraid other obligations will keep me from joining my good Frenz on Flagstaff today. Sadly, I'll be hoofing, an activity which I'm well aware is deeply _recreational_ in nature, and, as such, brings shame to my colleagues. Please keep me in your prayers." DU
